entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Humboldt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.5°C

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 32 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
